price: 63. Bato bazali kotuna yo тропа tango (tango ya bosambisami o mokolo ya suka), loba: Allah nde azali na boyebi na yango, mpe nini ekolakisa yo tango mosusu ngonga ezali pembeni?
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yasaluka al-nāsu ʿani al-sāʿati qul innamā ʿil'muhā ʿinda al-lahi wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata takūnu qarīban
